name: Evolution Chains
description: Evolution chains are essentially family trees. They start with the lowest stage within a family and detail evolution conditions for each as well as Pokémon they can evolve into up through the hierarchy.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: baby_trigger_item
fields.description: The item that a Pokémon would be holding when mating that would trigger the egg hatching a baby Pokémon rather than a basic Pokémon.

fields.name: chain
fields.description: The base chain link object. Each link contains evolution details for a Pokémon in the chain. Each link references the next Pokémon in the natural evolution order.

fields.name: is_baby
fields.description: Whether or not this link is for a baby Pokémon. This would only ever be true on the base link.

fields.name: species
fields.description: The Pokémon species at this point in the evolution chain.

fields.name: evolution_details
fields.description: All details regarding the specific details of the referenced Pokémon species evolution.

fields.name: evolves_to
fields.description: A List of chain objects.

fields.name: item
fields.description: The item required to cause evolution this into Pokémon species.

fields.name: trigger
fields.description: The type of event that triggers evolution into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: The id of the gender of the evolving Pokémon species must be in order to evolve into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: held_item
fields.description: The item the evolving Pokémon species must be holding during the evolution trigger event to evolve into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: known_move
fields.description: The move that must be known by the evolving Pokémon species during the evolution trigger event in order to evolve into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: known_move_type
fields.description: The evolving Pokémon species must know a move with this type during the evolution trigger event in order to evolve into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: location
fields.description: The location the evolution must be triggered at.

fields.name: min_level
fields.description: The minimum required level of the evolving Pokémon species to evolve into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: min_happiness
fields.description: The minimum required level of happiness the evolving Pokémon species to evolve into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: min_beauty
fields.description: The minimum required level of beauty the evolving Pokémon species to evolve into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: min_affection
fields.description: The minimum required level of affection the evolving Pokémon species to evolve into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: needs_overworld_rain
fields.description: Whether or not it must be raining in the overworld to cause evolution this Pokémon species.

fields.name: party_species
fields.description: The Pokémon species that must be in the players party in order for the evolving Pokémon species to evolve into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: party_type
fields.description: The player must have a Pokémon of this type in their party during the evolution trigger event in order for the evolving Pokémon species to evolve into this Pokémon species.

fields.name: relative_physical_stats
fields.description: The required relation between the Pokémon's Attack and Defense stats. 1 means Attack > Defense. 0 means Attack = Defense. -1 means Attack < Defense.

fields.name: time_of_day
fields.description: The required time of day. Day or night.

fields.name: trade_species
fields.description: Pokémon species for which this one must be traded.

fields.name: turn_upside_down
fields.description: Whether or not the 3DS needs to be turned upside-down as this Pokémon levels up.

name: Evolution Triggers
description: Evolution triggers are the events and conditions that cause a Pokémon to evolve. Check out [Bulbapedia](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Methods_of_evolution) for greater detail.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: pokemon_species
fields.description: A list of pokemon species that result from this evolution trigger.
